document.full_text: toyota motor co is recalling 51,000 tundra pick-up trucks for the model year 2011 due to a potential defect in the rear drive shaft.
document.title: toyota recalls trucks for rear drive shaft defect
lines_and_colors: toyota motor co is recalling 51,000 tundra pick-up trucks for the model year 2011 due to a potential defect in the rear drive shaft.
